title: Skorpions LC
body:
https://www.facebook.com/SKORPIONSLC/
Announcement 1

SKORPIONS LC Announcement!
The team is looking for a reliable and trustworthy member to administrate the EUW Club of SKORPIONS LC. The member has to speak English (and Deutch if possible) he has to be 18+ years old and he will be responsible for the observation of the club , check of the faction of team , Report excecution on Support Group of the team , weekly updates of the team's progress on SKP-HQ .
For more info and details a message on our FB Page or on our email ( skpleaugeclub@gmail.com ) will be useful for both sides.
Thank you for your time!
SKPLC-HQ

Announcement 2

SKORPIONS LC
SKPLC is looking for members that would like to join our club . Our team emphasises on competitive and dynamic games . Our objective is to get the highest ranks we can get under a team working and respective spirit.

The players that are interested to join SKPLC , they have to send a message to our official FB Page ( https://www.facebook.com/SKORPIONSLC/ ) or to send an email (skpleaugeclub@gmail.com).

To join the team you have to accept an agreement folder and fill some information that is needed. For more info a message on our FB Page or on our email would be useful for both sides.
Thank you for your time.
SKPLC-HQ
